text: 2017 is the first year in the history of Legacy Fighting Alliance, a mixed martial arts promotion based in the United States. ==Event list== ===Legacy Fighting Alliance 1: Peterson vs. Higo=== Legacy Fighting Alliance 1: Peterson vs. Higo was the inaugural event of Legacy Fighting Alliance and took place on January 13, 2017 after the merger of Legacy Fighting Championship and Resurrection Fighting Alliance. It aired on AXS TV.
